alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:25PM CDT until June 07 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Nemaha County in southeastern Nebraska... Richardson County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1024 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Nebraska City to 3 miles south of Julian to 4 miles south of Johnson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stella, Nemaha, Dawson, Brownville, Verdon, Shubert, Salem, Falls City and Rulo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
